## What's Changed

### New Features

- **Theme Customization**: Added support for switching between multiple built-in theme presets, configuring max width, and customizing component colors.
- **System Management**: Added "Reset to Defaults" functionality to restore initial settings.
- **Internationalization**: Added support for Traditional Chinese (zh_tw).

### Other Improvements

- **Version Management**: Refactored upgrade logic to improve reliability and fixed version retrieval issues.
- **UX Polish**: Refined setting descriptions for better clarity and updated translation files.
- For remaining changes, see the [full changelog](https://github.com/eamonxg/luci-app-aurora-config/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0)
